channel.title: Need a hoster
channel.description:
Note: to admin/mods: wasn't sure were to put this you should add a new board for it. feel free to move it.
looking for a hoster, upwards of 10 hours a day, i will trial you first then if your good, you will be given admin, and anyother thing in my server you want (exept owner lol) if you in anyway abuse me or my server i will withdraw instantly.
Pm me or email, (check my profile) thanks tawr

item.title: Need a hoster

item.description:

Before you pass your server over, know-Even if you ‘withdraw’ they have the source still, and can still steal it.
